title: Dust
cleaned_text: - God formed man of the life, [Gen. 3:14](/study/scriptures/ot/gen/3.14?lang=eng#p14) ( [Moses 4:20](/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/4.20?lang=eng#p20)). - [Gen. 3:19](/study/scriptures/ot/gen/3.19?lang=eng#p19) ( [Moses 4:25](/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/4.25?lang=eng#p25)). - I will make thy seed as the dust of the earth, [Gen. 13:16](/study/scriptures/ot/gen/13.16?lang=eng#p16). - me to speak unto the Lord, which am but dust, [Gen. 18:27](/study/scriptures/ot/gen/18.27?lang=eng#p27). - Stretch out thy rod, and smite the dust, [Ex. 8:16](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/8.16?lang=eng#p16). - Who can count the dust of Jacob, [Num. 23:10](/study/scriptures/ot/num/23.10?lang=eng#p10). - Shall the dust praise thee, [Ps. 30:9](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/30.9?lang=eng#p9). - he remembereth that we are dust, [Ps. 103:14](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/103.14?lang=eng#p14). - they die, and return to their dust, [Ps. 104:29](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/104.29?lang=eng#p29). - My soul cleaveth unto the dust, [Ps. 119:25](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/119.25?lang=eng#p25). - all are of the dust, and all turn to dust, [Eccl. 3:20](/study/scriptures/ot/eccl/3.20?lang=eng#p20). - Then shall the dust return to the earth, [Eccl. 12:7](/study/scriptures/ot/eccl/12.7?lang=eng#p7). - fortress ... bring to the ground, even to the dust, [Isa. 25:12](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/25.12?lang=eng#p12). - thy speech shall be low out of the dust, [Isa. 29:4](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/29.4?lang=eng#p4) ( [2 Ne. 26:16](/study/scriptures/bofm/2-ne/26.16?lang=eng#p16)). - They shall
